search

java.lang.Object search
Search function. The result is the intersection of 1) search result by keyword on columns [fullname | email | aaf] & 2) search result by organization & 3) search result by role. Due to the User List is quite small, so performance should not be a matter at here

show

java.lang.Object show

update

java.lang.Object update
there are some permission checking code at here, just because both Administrator and Data Custodian users can update users. and Data Custodian users has only restricted update permissions.
